channel.title: Runserver?
channel.description: when i run my server it says JAVA is not recognized as an internal command external command or operable batch file. also i have a server compiler and runserver button in one program and when i hit c for compile it says you do not have jdk 5 or 6 and the same for runserver. Finaly when i hit runserver it opens for like a tenth of a second then closes

item.title: Runserver?
item.dc:creator: @MasterofPK MasterofPK
item.description:
@MasterofPK wrote:

Go into C:/Program Files/Java/Ur JRE/bin.

Once there find the program called Java.exe, it will have the java logo on it.

Copy that, and paste it in your server files.

And to fix the auto-closing, right click runserver.bat, type “pause” at the bottom of all the text, save and close.

Also your compile can be fixed by right clicking it, going Edit, the finding all the JDK_1.6.0_** and replacing them with your
version.

                                                                                               MasterofPk

Read full topic
